page.title: 19SUMMARY of Square 04380335
page.content:
The residential area is a mixture of pre-war houses (owner occupied) and council property,built in the late sixties,including semi's and flats.
There are a considerable number of small firms set up in the last 10-15 years which seem well established.
The area is dominated by the Chaddesden by-pass which has cut down the amount of traffic on Nottingham Road.However the by-pass is a busy road and a worry to families living near by.
There is still a large amount of uncultivated land with two railway tracks cutting across.
